flow.descriptionCdata:
f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.15b2e57d-97d9-4d28-8f1c-fadb448bedb8.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.187c8406-1c06-426d-a830-9ee6ba2a7b4f.prompt=Service\: f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.2a7ac8ce-d66b-415b-83a6-15c6b731a108.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.2ed50b12-e4fb-4d62-9b1d-d767cb4f48d9.prompt=Alertnate Credentials - Password\: f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.5c70fd95-402c-455d-9169-8e41b7b1f72a.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.7a50897e-f4ea-401b-b513-6a6fd88db28b.description=Sleeps for X seconds f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.7c74bcf6-7f4d-4d71-b980-effd102bc5f5.prompt=Alertnate Credentials - UserName\: f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.a7141555-bc53-4a4b-90f7-eb1865fb647b.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.c11ae8a0-1370-4449-a0d4-a29ff476d971.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.d93fae86-bea7-4662-aa01-c1e40187e743.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.description=
Restarts a windows service

Inputs\:
host - The host on which the service resides.
service - The service to restart.
altuser - The username to user when authenticating with host.
altpass - The password to user when authenticating with host.

Responses\:
success - Service restarted successfully.
failure - Service could not be restarted.
service failed to restart - Service was stopped, but would not restart.
service didn't stop - Service failed to stop.
f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.eb6d655c-a929-4e50-a2a6-832bf677a4e6.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; f2f9045e-3556-4d24-8bc2-a538090539af.f1433ad5-7c0f-473b-be2f-374d6a04ef83.prompt=HostName\:
flow.name: Restart Windows Service

scriptlet.name: Step Set Global Context Value in Flow Restart Windows Service (ac5070d8-213d-48c0-9010-b325ed77a905)
